description: Translate code docstrings and comments using multiple LLMs (Claude, OpenAI, Gemini, Azure OpenAI). Supports Python, JS, TS, Go, Markdown.
config.targetLang: Target language code (e.g., en, ja, zh, ko, fr, de, es, it, pt, ru)
config.exclude: Glob patterns (workspace-relative or basename) to exclude from translation
config.anthropicApiKey: Anthropic API Key (ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable takes precedence)
config.model: Anthropic model to use for translation
config.openaiApiKey: OpenAI API Key (OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable takes precedence)
config.openaiModel: OpenAI model to use for translation
config.geminiApiKey: Gemini API Key (GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable takes precedence)
config.geminiModel: Gemini model to use for translation
config.azureOpenaiApiKey: Azure OpenAI API Key (AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable takes precedence)
config.maxRetries: Maximum number of retries on rate limit
